title: Successful login with valid credentials and correct role assignment
description: Verify that users can login with correct username and password and are assigned appropriate role-based permissions (Superadmin, Owner, Staff).

steps.description: Navigate to login screen
Input valid username and password
Submit login form
Authentication succeeds and JWT token is issued
User is redirected to dashboard appropriate to their business mode and role
User's permissions reflect their role capabilities

title: Failed login with invalid credentials
description: Verify login fails and appropriate error message is displayed when an incorrect username or password is provided.

steps.description: Navigate to login screen
Input invalid username or password
Submit login form
Authentication fails
Error message indicating invalid credentials is shown

title: Tenant data isolation enforcement
description: Verify that users may only access data belonging to their specific tenant and cross-tenant data access is prevented.

steps.description: Login as a user belonging to Tenant A
Attempt to access or query data belonging to Tenant B via UI and API
Access is denied with authorization error
No data from other tenants is visible or retrievable

title: Multi-tenant dashboard renders correct mode-specific content
description: Verify that the dashboard adapts correctly based on tenant business mode (Retail, F&B, Service) showing relevant statistics and sidebar navigation.

steps.description: Login as Retail tenant user
Retail-specific dashboard with Retail features and stats is displayed
Logout and login as F&B tenant user
F&B-specific dashboard with table management, kitchen display is displayed
Logout and login as Service tenant user
Service-specific dashboard with calendar bookings and staff management is displayed

title: Create new product with valid data
description: Verify that users can successfully add new products with all required fields, and product appears in the product list with correct details.

steps.description: Navigate to product management screen
Click 'Add Product' button
Fill in valid product details including name, category, price, and stock
Submit product form
Product is added successfully and confirmation is shown
New product appears in product list with correct details

title: Edit existing product and verify updated details
description: Verify users can edit product attributes and changes are persistently saved and reflected in product listings.

steps.description: Navigate to product list
Select an existing product to edit
Modify product attributes such as price, category, or stock
Save changes
Confirmation of successful update is shown
Updated product details are correctly displayed

title: Delete a product and confirm removal from product list
description: Verify that users can delete products and that deleted products no longer appear in the product list and are inaccessible.

steps.description: Navigate to product list
Select a product to delete
Initiate product deletion and confirm prompt
Product is removed from list and a success message is shown
Attempt to access deleted product details
Product details are no longer accessible

title: Category filtering and search in product management
description: Verify that filtering products by category and using search functionality works correctly and updates product listings appropriately.

steps.description: Navigate to product list
Select a product category filter
Product list displays only products within selected category
Enter keyword in product search input
Product list shows only products that match search criteria

title: POS cashier flow with multiple products and correct cart total
description: Verify cashier can add multiple products to cart, quantities are adjustable, and cart total updates correctly.

steps.description: Login as staff user for Retail mode
Navigate to POS cashier screen
Add multiple products with various quantities to the cart
Cart reflects all products with correct quantities and prices
Cart total amount sum is correctly calculated and displayed

title: POS payment processing with Cash, Card, and E-Wallet methods
description: Verify that POS payment can be completed using all supported payment methods and appropriate receipt is generated post payment.

steps.description: Add products to cart in POS cashier
Select Cash payment method and complete transaction
Payment is successful and receipt is generated
Repeat for Card payment method
Payment is successful and receipt is generated
Repeat for E-Wallet payment method
Payment is successful and receipt is generated

title: POS cart update and removal of items
description: Verify users can update quantity of items in cart or remove items, reflecting accurate cart state and pricing.

steps.description: Add products to POS cart
Change quantity of an item in cart
Cart updates quantity and recalculates total price correctly
Remove an item from cart
Item is removed and cart total updates accordingly

title: Order history filtering by status and date range
description: Verify that order history listing can be filtered using various statuses and date ranges, showing only relevant orders.

steps.description: Access order history screen
Apply filter for order status (e.g., completed, pending)
Order list displays only orders matching selected status
Apply date range filter
Order list displays only orders within selected date range

title: Expandable order details display
description: Verify that clicking on an order expands detailed information including items, quantities, and payment info.

steps.description: Navigate to order history
Select an order entry to expand details
Detailed view shows complete order information accurately
Collapse the detailed view
Order list returns to condensed view

title: Sales reporting displays accurate aggregated data for selected time frame
description: Verify that sales charts and daily sales figures reflect correct aggregation of transactional data for specified dates.

steps.description: Navigate to reporting screen
Select a specific date range
Dashboard displays charts and sales totals matching aggregated transactional data for range
Change date range and review update
Reporting data updates accurately according to new date range

title: Settings modification and persistence of changes
description: Verify that updating settings (general app config, user roles, printer settings) are saved, persisted on reload, and take effect.

steps.description: Navigate to settings module
Modify general settings, add or edit user roles, and configure printer settings
Save settings changes
Settings save confirmation appears
Reload application or module
Changes persist and system behavior reflects new settings

title: F&B mode table management operations
description: Verify that tables in F&B mode can be created, assigned, and managed properly including table status updates.

steps.description: Login as F&B tenant user and navigate to table management
Add a new table with valid attributes
New table is visible in the table map with correct status
Update table status (e.g., occupied, available)
Table status updates accordingly and persists on reload

title: F&B order modifiers applied correctly during order creation
description: Verify that staff can select modifiers for menu items and the modified order reflects correct details and pricing.

steps.description: Create a new order in F&B POS
Select products with various modifiers (e.g., extra toppings)
Order reflects modifiers and adjusted price accordingly
Complete the order
Modifiers persist in order summary and history

title: Service mode calendar bookings creation and modification
description: Verify users can create, edit, and cancel bookings with proper validations and updates displayed in calendar view.

steps.description: Login as Service tenant user and access calendar bookings
Create a new booking with required details
Booking appears correctly on calendar
Edit the booking's time or details
Changes are saved and visible in calendar
Cancel the booking
Booking is removed from calendar

title: Superadmin creates, edits, deletes tenants and impersonates users securely
description: Verify that the Superadmin can perform full CRUD operations on tenants and successfully impersonate tenant users without data leakage.

steps.description: Login as Superadmin
Create a new tenant with valid data
Tenant appears in tenant list and can be selected
Edit tenant details and save changes
Changes are reflected correctly
Delete a tenant and confirm removal
Tenant is removed and data inaccessible
Impersonate a user from an existing tenant
Superadmin gains access as impersonated user with tenant data isolation enforced
